titleStmt.title: A Rational discours touching the universal medicin

notesStmt.note: Copy annotated in MS. at head of text: "A... an high Germane physitian comeing late by it of Muscovie high Germany & Holland hath not only this one specified but also many more medicines for to cure the greater distempers of men & women today. At ye three Cranes right agt. ye Sarracenshead in Channcery Lane at London 1. Januar. 1672.".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
